benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/customFields - Retrieve payment custom fields

covered: Valid Request: Scenarios demonstrate successful retrieval with various audit levels and presence/absence of custom fields
Empty Response: Tests cover empty array when no custom fields exist
Query Parameters: Tests cover audit parameter variations (NONE/FULL/MINIMAL), extra parameters ignored, and invalid audit values
Authorization: Tests cover missing and invalid authentication tokens
Error Handling and Resilience: Tests cover invalid paymentId formats (400), non-existent paymentId (404), service unavailability (503), and dependency failures (502)
Robustness: Tests include retry after transient network failure
Performance and Scale: Tests address large datasets (1000 custom fields) and response time checks, plus concurrency scenarios
gaps: Pagination: No explicit tests for server-side pagination when returning large datasets
Rate Limiting: No tests covering rate limiting/throttling of concurrent requests
Caching Behavior: No tests validating caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) or caching efficacy
Authorization Boundary: No test explicitly verifying 403 Forbidden when user lacks sufficient permissions
recommendations: Add explicit pagination tests (e.g., page/size, and total pages) to ensure proper handling of large result sets
Add rate limiting/throttling tests to validate behavior under high load
Add tests for caching behavior (ETag, Cache-Control) to confirm caching semantics
Add a 403 Forbidden scenario to cover authorization boundaries when credentials are present but insufficient
